snippet: Plus: Why Facebook spent all of that money, who's hiring, how to start your business on YouTube and Burger King's bacon sundae.
abstract: Plus: Why Facebook spent all of that money, who's hiring, how to start your business on YouTube and Burger King's bacon sundae.
lead_paragraph: What's affecting me, my clients and other small-business owners this week.

headline.main: This Week in Small Business: Raising Caine
